abstract: White Collar Watch looks at the laws that are likely to be the focus of investigations of the News Corporation and the potential problems that prosecutors would face in pursuing criminal charges.
snippet: White Collar Watch looks at the laws that are likely to be the focus of investigations of the News Corporation and the potential problems that prosecutors would face in pursuing criminal charges.
lead_paragraph: The burgeoning scandal at the News Corporation has crossed over to the United States as federal investigations of the company’s conduct have started. There is no clearer sign of the seriousness of the company’s potential exposure to criminal prosecution than its hiring of Brendan V. Sullivan Jr. of Williams & Connolly, one of the most aggressive criminal defense lawyers in the country.

headline.main: News Corp. Braces for Legal Trouble in the U.S.
